function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Air pressure controls affected by air leaks","Impact":"Diminished efficacy of air pressurization systems","Mitigation":"Optimization of air pressurization systems to avoid air leaks","Technologies":"Building automation systems, smart sensors, and control algorithms for real-time air pressure monitoring","People":"Occupants, healthcare personnel, and visitors in buildings with air pressurization systems","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance"}]}
